profile_positions.company: Roots to Rise - TAO Deep Ecology
profile_positions.description:
Ecological leadership. Deep Ecology. Transforming knowledge into wisdom using nature as a guide. Helping you understand organisational ecology and strenthening transformational leadership using the Inner Development Goals. Moving beyond Theory of Change to Practice of Change.
The Art of Deep Ecology: www.rootstorise.nl (only Dutch)
